item.title: Use Zap Observer
item.description: If you are using zap as your logging tool, then when you write the tests, you might want to assert the function via the logs. You can use zap/observer package to make it possible. Below is a code piece to demonstrate how it works: package main import ( "testing" "go.uber.org/zap" "go.uber.org/zap/zapcore" "go.uber.org/zap/zaptest/observer" ) func LogHello(name string) { zap.L().Info("hello: " + name) } func TestLogHello(t *testing.T) { // arrange core, recordedLogs := observer.
